languages.text: "Срочное сообщение с Даргонуса, Лорд-капитан! Наши астропаты принимают многочисленные сообщения... хотя нет, это не обычные сообщения — это мольбы о помощи! Даргонус сообщает о массированном рейде ксеносов, и каждый мыслеобраз облечен в огненные всполохи!"

traits.locale_text: "Срочное сообщение с Даргонуса, Лорд-капитан! Наши астропаты принимают многочисленные сообщения... хотя нет, это не обычные сообщения — это мольбы о помощи! Даргонус сообщает о массированном рейде ксеносов, и каждый мыслеобраз облечен в огненные всполохи!"

languages.text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"
languages.original_text: "Срочное сообщение с Даргонуса, Лорд-капитан! Наши астропаты принимают многочисленные сообщения... хотя нет, это не обычные сообщения — это мольбы о помощи! Даргонус сообщает о массированном рейде ксеносов, и каждый мыслеобраз облечен в огненные всполохи!"

traits.locale_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our astropaths are receiving numerous missives... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xeno raid, and each mental image is aglow with fire!"

"I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our astropaths are receiving numerous missives... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xeno raid, and each mental image is aglow with fire!"

"I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

"I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

"I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

languages.text: “我收到了来自达戈努斯的紧急消息，舰长大人！我们的星语者接收到了大量信息……但这些并不是普通的信息，每条信息都是求救信息！达戈努斯报告说，异形进行了大规模入侵，每份传来的精神图像都被包裹在烈焰之中！”
languages.original_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

traits.locale_text: “我收到了来自达戈努斯的紧急消息，舰长大人！我们的星语者接收到了大量信息……但这些并不是普通的信息，每条信息都是求救信息！达戈努斯报告说，异形进行了大规模入侵，每份传来的精神图像都被包裹在烈焰之中！”

languages.text: «¡Tengo un mensaje urgente de Dargonus, Lord Capitán! Nuestros astrópatas están recibiendo numerosas transmisiones... pero no son mensajes corrientes: ¡todos ellos son súplicas de auxilio! ¡Dargonus está asediado por un asalto xenos a gran escala, y cada imagen mental que nos transmiten está cubierta de llamas!».
languages.original_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Tengo un mensaje urgente de Dargonus, Lord Capitán! Nuestros astrópatas están recibiendo numerosas transmisiones... pero no son mensajes corrientes: ¡todos ellos son súplicas de auxilio! ¡Dargonus está asediado por un asalto xenos a gran escala, y cada imagen mental que nos transmiten está cubierta de llamas!».

languages.text: "Ich habe eine dringende Nachricht von Dargonus, Lord Captain! Unsere Astropathen empfangen zahlreiche Übertragungen... Aber nein, das sind keine gewöhnlichen Nachrichten — jede einzelne ist ein Hilferuf! Dargonus berichtet von einem massiven Xenos-Angriff, und jedes übermittelte mentale Bild ist in Flammen gehüllt!"
languages.original_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

traits.locale_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

languages.text: « Un message urgent en provenance de Dargonus, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nos astropathes sont bombardés de transmissions sortant de l'ordinaire... c'est un véritable déluge d'appels à l'aide ! Dargonus signale un raid xénos de grande ampleur. Toutes les images mentales reçues montrent un monde en proie aux flammes ! »
languages.original_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

traits.locale_text: « Un message urgent en provenance de Dargonus, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ! Nos astropathes sont bombardés de transmissions sortant de l'ordinaire... c'est un véritable déluge d'appels à l'aide ! Dargonus signale un raid xénos de grande ampleur. Toutes les images mentales reçues montrent un monde en proie aux flammes ! »

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスから緊急メッセージが届きました！我々の感応通信官はいくつもの通信を受信して​​います…ですが、こんな…普通のメッセージではありません。どれも必死に助けを求めています！ダルゴナスは大規模な異種族の襲撃を報告して、送られてくる精神イメージはどれも炎に包まれます！」
languages.original_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、ダルゴナスから緊急メッセージが届きました！我々の感応通信官はいくつもの通信を受信して​​います…ですが、こんな…普通のメッセージではありません。どれも必死に助けを求めています！ダルゴナスは大規模な異種族の襲撃を報告して、送られてくる精神イメージはどれも炎に包まれます！」

languages.text: "Dargonus'tan gelen acil bir mesaj var Lord Kaptan!" Astropatlarımız sayısız ileti alıyor ama... Bunlar sıradan mesajlar değil. Her biri de bir yardım isteği! Dargonus'ta devasa bir zeno baskını gerçekleştiği bildiriliyor ve iletilen bütün zihinsel görseller alevlerle kaplı!"
languages.original_text: "I have an urgent message from Dargonus, Lord Captain! Our Astropaths are receiving numerous transmissions... But no, these aren't ordinary messages — each and every one is a plea for help! Dargonus is reporting a massive xenos raid, and every mental image transmitted is wreathed in flame!"
